section.title: Overview
section.para:
This module implements TLS operations using the
wolfSSL libarary. It provides the primitives required by the tls_mgm module in order to expose a higher-level API used by TLS-based protocol modules like proto_tls or proto_wss.
The wolfSSL library is statically-linked and bundled with this module so no installation or external dependency is required.

section.title: Compilation
section.para:
The following packages must be installed before compiling this module:
autoconf.
automake.
libtool.
